meanings.definition: The quality or state of having prominent jowls.
meanings.sent1: Her jowliness was quite noticeable as she smiled broadly.
meanings.sent2: The bulldog's jowliness gave it a distinguished appearance.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the jowliness of the politician, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The jowliness of the old lion made him look even more regal in the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The jowliness of the pug made it endearing to everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a fleshy lower jaw or cheek.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's jowliness was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The baby's jowliness made everyone want to pinch its cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully referred to the turkey's jowliness as the juiciest part.
meanings.sent4: The jowliness of the hamster's cheeks made it look like it was storing food for later.
meanings.sent5: The jowliness of the walrus was a defining feature of its appearance.
